title: Temporary Preserves
description: One hundred and thirty-three photographs of David Zinn's otherwise fleeting street art creatures, preserved in a bound collection of full-color 8.5" x 11" images that can be enjoyed anywhere and anytime, no computer required. Readers can also discover the improvised origins of Sluggo, the significance of flying pigs, and the reasons why a cracked sidewalk is sometimes the best canvas of all.
author: David  Zinn
